name: Zombie Escape (ChefSemiColon)
description:
Zombie Escape is a arcade style shooter game made by Zach Walker and Mihail Benev for a University project. 

The basis of the game is simple keep killing zombies. The more zombies you kill the higher the score you will get, which is shown after you die.

The controls for the game are very simple as well. WASD to move and aim with the mouse. Left click will shoot a bullet. P will take you back to the in game menu and Escape will let you quit the game.
